pkgmetadata.longdescription: Structural Modeling for Multiple Latent Class Variables // Provides comprehensive tools for the implementation of Structural Latent Class Models (SLCM), including Latent Transition Analysis (LTA; Linda M. Collins and Stephanie T. Lanza, 2009) doi:10.1002/9780470567333, Latent Class Profile Analysis (LCPA; Hwan Chung et al., 2010) doi:10.1111/j.1467-985x.2010.00674.x, and Joint Latent Class Analysis (JLCA; Saebom Jeon et al., 2017) doi:10.1080/10705511.2017.1340844, and any other extended models involving multiple latent class variables.
